item.title: Raichur Microfinance Scam: Four Arrested for Extorting Farmers
item.description:
<![CDATA[Tired of too many ads? go ad free now
RAICHUR: The Raichur Rural Police arrested four persons on Saturday for allegedly extorting money from farmers under the guise of microfinance recovery. The suspects are identified as Fayyaz, Sheikh MD Ayub, Syed Shahbaz Ahmed, and Haroon Rashid.Sheikh MD Ayub, who works as a recovery officer at Bajaj Finance, teamed up with three associates to identify individuals with unpaid loans using a mobile application. The group allegedly threatened borrowers by blo...]]>
